message:
You used the placeholder {json} instead of pasting the en-US.json content. Please paste the actual JSON to translate. I will: 
- Translate string values into Japanese (ja) 
- Keep any {placeholders} intact
- Keep the keys unchanged unless you request otherwise
- Return valid JSON with unescaped Unicode
If you want keys translated or other special handling (HTML/Markdown, ICU messages), say so.
